mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCORE_BOARD (SCORENO, USER_NO, PTOC_PTOP, WIN, LST) VALUES (SEQ_SCORE_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{ptcPtp}, #{win}, #{lst})
mapper.update:
UPDATE SCORE_BOARD
WIN=WIN+1,
LST=LST+1,
WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo} AND PTOC_PTOP=#{ptcPtp}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RANK, d.* FROM (SELECT a.USER_NO userNo, b.USER_ID userId, b.USER_NM userNm, a.WIN WIN, a.LST LOST, round((a.WIN / (a.WIN + a.LST))*100,2) RATE FROM SCORE_BOARD a JOIN MEMBER b ON a.USER_NO = b.USER_NO WHERE a.WIN + a.LST >= 2 ORDER BY (a.WIN / (a.WIN + a.LST)) DESC) d WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
